original: 潁川潁陰人，曹魏官員，荀彧兄長。曹操征袁尚時，原已歸降的高幹趁機反叛，又密謀遣兵襲鄴，但被荀衍察覺，因而失敗。荀衍也因此大功而封侯。
text: Yingchuan Yingyin, Cao Wei official, Xun Yu brother. When Cao Cao conquered Yuan Shang, the surrendered senior officials took the opportunity to rebel and conspired to send troops to attack Ye, but Xun Yan detected it and failed. Xun Yan was also named a Marquis for his great achievements.
